short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free Amazon Merch On Demand listing Semi-Automation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Creating Amazon Merch on Demand listings has never been this easy.

This simple extension replaces the word "var" in your listing with the filename of your uploaded artwork.

You can use the word "var" in your:
- Title
- Brand name
- Feature bullets
- Description

And best of all, it works for listings in all marketplaces!

All you have to do is save your publishing settings, open a new "create page," and upload as much as you like.
